titles.title: Debt-to-GDP Transparency and Stabilization Act
Debt-to-GDP Transparency and Stabilization Act

A bill to require that the President's annual budget submission to Congress and any concurrent resolution on the budget include the ratio of the public debt to the estimated gross domestic product of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary:
Debt-to-GDP Transparency and Stabilization Act
This bill requires the President's annual budget and congressional budget resolutions to include the ratio of the public debt to the estimated gross domestic product.
